import {Component, Injectable, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {GetCurrentLocation} from "../../../shared/services/GetCurrentLocation"; import {AddDelivery} from "../../../shared/services/AddDelivery"; import {Deliveries} from "../../../shared/services/Deliveries"; @Injectable({ providedIn: 'root' }) @Component({ selector: 'app-checkout', templateUrl: './checkout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./checkout.component.scss'] }) export class CheckoutComponent implements OnInit { isContentHidden = false; constructor(private getCurrentLocationn: GetCurrentLocation, private addDeliveries: AddDelivery, private delivery: Deliveries) {} ngOnInit() { } hideContent() { this.isContentHidden = !this.isContentHidden; } getCurrentLocation() { console.log(this.getCurrentLocationn.getCurrentLocation()); } addDelivery1(){ this.addDeliveries.addDelivery(this.delivery); } }
